message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, I'll take the majority
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but still a fair deal
You're not giving me enough, I'll take a bit more
I'll give you a smaller share, but you're getting closer to a deal
I'm not going to take the smaller share, I'll try to get more
I'll give you a tiny share, but it's the best I can do
I'm not giving up, I'll take a bigger share now
